tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE Doctors (
    doctor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    doctor_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    specialty VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    contact_number VARCHAR(15) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE Doctors (doctor_id INT, doctor_name VARCHAR(255), specialty VARCHAR(255));
CREATE TABLE Patients (patient_id INT, patient_name VARCHAR(255), doctor_id INT, treatment_plan TEXT);
CREATE TABLE doctors (doctor_id INT PRIMARY KEY, doctor_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, specialty VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, hospital_id INT NOT NULL);

CREATE TABLE patients (patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY, patient_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, doctor_id INT NOT NULL, diagnosis VARCHAR(100), treatment_plan TEXT, admission_date DATE NOT NULL, discharge_date DATE);
CREATE TABLE treatments (treatment_id INT PRIMARY KEY, patient_id INT NOT NULL, treatment_date DATE NOT NULL, treatment_description TEXT NOT NULL);

CREATE TABLE Patients (
    patient_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_name VARCHAR(255),
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    doctor_id UUID REFERENCES Doctors(doctor_id)
);
